geoPoint.title: Geo point
geoPoint.description: Please list latitude and longitude separated with a comma without spaces, e.g. 41.40338,2.17403.

product-types.BillOfMaterials: Product with a Bill of Materials

catalog.title: Catalog
catalog.description: This is a central point for managing your store merchandise and creating catalogs for brans, product lines, or particular suppliers.

virtual-catalog.title: Virtual catalog
virtual-catalog.description: Virtual catalogs allow you to visualize the products and categories stored in physical categories in a different way.

categories-items-list.title: Categories and Items
categories-items-list.subtitle: Browsing {{name}}
categories-items-list.title-mapping: Choose Categories and Items for mapping
categories-items-list.subtitle-mapping: Creating a Link within your virtual catalog

categories-items-add.title: New category item
categories-items-add.subtitle: Choose new item type

category.title: Category
category.description: This is a container for other Categories and Products or Variations.

link.title: Link
link.description: A link to physical Category or Product.

physical-product.title: Physical Product
physical-product.description: A physical product is an item for sale one may order. It can be used for targeted promotions and requires physical shipping.

digital-product.title: Digital Product
digital-product.description: A digital product is an item for sale one may order. It can be used for targeted promotions and is downloadable, which means it does not require any physical shipping.

bill-of-materials-product.title: Product with a Bill of Materials
bill-of-materials-product.description: This is a physical product that also includes a bill of materials (a list of ancillary items). It can be used for targeted promotions and requires physical shipping.

categories-items-add.catalog-item-description: This is a central point for managing your store merchandise and creating catalogs for brans, product lines, or particular suppliers.
categories-items-add.virtual-catalog-item-description: Virtual catalogs allow you to visualize the products and categories stored in physical categories in a different way.

placeholders.name: Please give this filter a name

labels.new-dictionary-property-caution: You can manage dictionary items only once you save the property

descriptions.character-limit: Specify a minimum and/or maximum allowed number of characters
descriptions.pattern: Make this field match a pattern, such as email address, URL, or a custom regular expression

validations.maxLength: This field must not contain more than {{max}} characters
validations.minLenght: This field must contain at least {{min}} characters
validations.pattern: This field does not match the selected pattern

labels.duplicate-property-in-product: The property named {{propertyName}} already exists in {{categoryName}}. The name must be unique.
labels.duplicate-property-in-catalog: The property named {{propertyName}} already exists at the root catalog. The name must be unique.
labels.duplicate-property-in-variation1: The property named {{propertyName}} already exists for this variation
labels.property-naming-error: The property name must begin with an alphanumeric character and can contain only Latin characters, digits, and underscores (_). If an underscore (_) is used, make sure it has an alphanumeric character before and after it.

catalogs-select.title: Select Catalog
catalogs-select.subtitle: Creating a Link within your virtual catalog

labels.priority-description: The lowest value will be used first.

validations.sku: The SKU cannot contain these characters: $+;=%{}[]|@~!^*&()?'<>

descr.start-date: If you do not specify a start date, the product will become active immediately once you save it.
descr.end-date: If you do not specify an end date, the product will be active until you deactivate it.

labels.name: Name
labels.drag-drop-comment: Drag and drop your images here
labels.make-default-image: Drag and drop an image to the top left corner of the image area to set it as default.

descr.external-link: Use an external image URL instead of uploading it to assets
descr.external-link-warning: "Example: scheme://your_resource.png". For security reasons, you must only use images that support the URL scheme of the Storefront when uploading external images.

labels.no-apikey: You have not provided any Google API Key in the platform configuration file. The video information will be incomplete.

labels.drag-drop-comment: Drag and drop your files here
labels.name: Name

labels.sorting-prompt: Set how the associated items will appear in the web store. Drag and drop the products to change the order.
labels.name: Name

size.label: Aggregation size
size.description: Maximum number of aggregation values in the search results. 0 = unlimited

values-Attribute.label: Allowed values
values-Attribute.description: Enter aggregation values allowed in the search results. Leave this blank to allow all values.

values-Range.label: Range bounds
values-Range.description: Bounds will be sorted automatically before saving. Ranges are constructed as follows: Under [bound 1], [bound 1] to [bound 2], ... , Over [bound N]

values-PriceRange.label: Price range bounds
values-PriceRange.description: Bounds will be sorted automatically before saving. Price ranges are constructed as follows: Under [bound 1], [bound 1] to [bound 2], ... , Over [bound N]

property-delete.msg2: Remove only Property metadata and keep the values in the related objects
property-delete.msg3: Delete completely with all related values

property-dictionary-item-delete.warning: WARNING: This change is permanent and cannot be undone. Applying this change may result in a data loss.
